displayName.brazilian: Não Só da Boca pra Fora

description.english: Save all Whistling Man Targets
description.french: Vous avez sauvé toutes les cibles du Siffleur.
description.italian: Salva tutti i bersagli del Fischiatore
description.spanish: Salva a todos los objetivos del hombre del silbido.
description.schinese: 拯救哨魔的所有目标
description.tchinese: 拯救所有口哨殺手的目標
description.russian: Вы спасли всех жертв Свистуна.
description.japanese: ホイッスリングマンの標的を全員助ける
description.brazilian: Salve todos os alvos do Assobiador

description.english: Nobody survives The Whistling Man
description.french: Personne n'a survécu face au Siffleur.
description.italian: Nessuno si salva dal Fischiatore
description.spanish: Nadie sobrevive al hombre del silbido.
description.schinese: 无人从哨魔手中生还
description.tchinese: 無人從口哨殺手手中生還
description.russian: Встречу со Свистуном никто не пережил.
description.japanese: ホイッスリングマンに全員殺される
description.brazilian: Ninguém sobrevive ao Assobiador

description.english: Reach the end of Whistling Night
description.french: Vous avez atteint la fin de la Nuit du sifflement.
description.italian: Arriva alla fine della Notte del fischio
description.spanish: Llega al final de la noche del silbido.
description.schinese: 迎来吹哨夜的结束
description.tchinese: 抵達口哨之夜的尾聲
description.russian: Вы пережили ночь Свистуна.
description.japanese: ホイッスリングナイトを終わりまで見届ける
description.brazilian: Chegue ao fim da Noite do Assobio

description.japanese: マルティネス副保安官がホイッスリングマンから生き延びた
description.brazilian: A policial Martinez sobreviveu ao Assobiador

description.english: Restore power to the station after the blackout
description.german: Stelle die Stromversorgung beim Sender wieder her
description.french: Vous avez rétabli le courant à la station après la coupure.
description.italian: Ripristina la corrente alla stazione radio dopo il blackout
description.spanish: Devuelve la electricidad a la emisora tras el apagón.
description.schinese: 在停电后恢复电台的电力
description.tchinese: 在斷電後恢復電台的電力
description.russian: Вы восстановили электричество на станции.
description.japanese: 停電後に局内の電源を復旧させる
description.brazilian: Restabeleça a energia da estação após o apagão

description.english: Gain access to the station after being locked out
description.german: Erlange Zugang zum Sender, nachdem du ausgesperrt warst
description.french: Vous avez trouvé un moyen de rentrer après avoir été enfermé hors de la station.
description.italian: Rientra nella stazione radio dopo essere rimasto fuori
description.koreana: 방송국 바깥에서 고립된 후, 다시 들어가는 방법을 찾으세요
description.spanish: Entra en la emisora tras quedarte encerrado fuera.
description.schinese: 被关在电台外面后找到进入的方式
description.tchinese: 被鎖在外面後找到方法進入電台
description.russian: Вы благополучно вернулись с улицы.
description.japanese: 閉め出された後で局に入れるようにする
description.brazilian: Ganhe acesso à estação após ficar do lado de fora

description.english: Play all records during the course of the night
description.german: Spiele im Verlauf der Nacht alle Platten
description.french: Vous avez lu tous les disques pendant la nuit.
description.italian: Riproduci tutti i dischi nel corso della notte
description.koreana: 밤이 끝나기 전까지 모든 음반을 트세요
description.spanish: Pon todos los discos a lo largo de la noche.
description.schinese: 在这一晚播放所有唱片
description.tchinese: 在這一夜之中播放所有唱片
description.russian: Вы поставили все музыкальные пластинки.
description.japanese: 一晩の間にすべてのレコードを再生する
description.brazilian: Toque todas as gravações ao longo da noite

displayName.japanese: ディスコグラフィー完成

description.english: Collect all hidden records around the station
description.german: Sammle alle versteckten Platten auf dem Sendergelände
description.french: Vous avez trouvé tous les disques cachés dans la station.
description.italian: Raccogli tutti i dischi nascosti in giro per la stazione radio
description.koreana: 방송국 곳곳에 숨겨진 음반을 모두 입수하세요
description.spanish: Obtén todos los discos escondidos por la emisora.
description.schinese: 收集电台所有隐藏的唱片
description.tchinese: 收集電台各處的所有隱藏唱片
description.russian: Вы собрали все спрятанные на станции пластинки.
description.japanese: 局に隠されたレコードをすべて集める
description.brazilian: Pegue todas as gravações escondidas pela estação

description.english: Unlock all doors in the station
description.german: Schließe alle Türen im Sender auf
description.french: Vous avez déverrouillé toutes les portes de la station.
description.italian: Sblocca tutte le porte della stazione radio
description.spanish: Abre todas las puertas de la emisora.
description.schinese: 打开电台内所有上锁的门
description.tchinese: 解鎖電台中的所有門
description.russian: Вы открыли все двери на станции.
description.japanese: 局内にあるすべてのドアを開錠する
description.brazilian: Destranque todas as portas da estação

description.english: Don't respond when prompted for 30 seconds
description.french: Vous n'avez pas répondu pendant 30 secondes.
description.italian: Fai passare 30 secondi prima di rispondere se ti interpellano
description.koreana: 말할 차례가 된 후, 30초 동안 반응하지 마세요
description.spanish: No respondas durante 30 segundos cuando tengas que hacerlo.
description.schinese: 提示后30秒内无应答
description.tchinese: 在提詞時不回應長達 30 秒
description.russian: Вы тянули с ответом целых 30 секунд.
description.japanese: 指示が出てから30秒間反応しない
description.brazilian: Passe 30 segundos sem responder a uma solicitação

displayName.spanish: Genio de la mesa de mezclas
displayName.japanese: サウンドブラスターの達人

description.english: Play a sound on the soundboard during a call
description.german: Spiele einen Sound auf dem Soundboard, während du auf Sendung bist
description.french: Vous avez utilisé la console de mixage pendant l'émission.
description.italian: Riproduci un suono con il mixer durante la trasmissione
description.spanish: Usa un sonido de la mesa de mezclas cuando estés en directo.
description.schinese: 在直播时播放声控台上的一种声音
description.tchinese: 直播時在音效板上播放音效
description.russian: Вы использовали звуковую панель в прямом эфире.
description.japanese: オンエア中にサウンドボードで音を再生する
description.brazilian: Toque algo na mesa de som enquanto estiver no ar

description.english: Place the mannequin head into the fridge
description.german: Lege den Puppenkopf in den Kühlschrank
description.french: Vous avez placé la tête du mannequin sur le frigo.
description.italian: Posiziona la testa di un manichino nel frigo
description.spanish: Mete la cabeza de maniquí en la nevera.
description.schinese: 把人体模型的头放进冰箱
description.tchinese: 將人體模特兒的頭放進冰箱
description.russian: Вы засунули голову манекена в холодильник.
description.japanese: マネキンの頭を冷蔵庫に入れる
description.brazilian: Coloque a cabeça do manequim na geladeira

displayName.japanese: スポンサーからのメッセージ

description.english: Play all radio ads during the course of the night
description.german: Spiele im Verlauf der Nacht sämtliche Radiowerbung
description.french: Vous avez joué toutes les publicités pendant la nuit.
description.italian: Manda tutte le pubblicità radiofoniche nel corso della notte
description.koreana: 밤이 끝나기 전까지 모든 라디오 광고를 트세요
description.spanish: Emite todos los anuncios de radio a lo largo de la noche.
description.schinese: 在这一晚播放所有电台广告
description.tchinese: 在這一夜之中播放所有廣播廣告
description.russian: Вы поставили все кассеты с рекламой.
description.japanese: 一晩の間にすべてのラジオ広告を再生する
description.brazilian: Toque todos os anúncios da rádio ao longo da noite

displayName.japanese: フォレスト・ダッシュ

description.english: Finish the game in under 4 hours with all callers surviving
description.german: Beende das Spiel in unter 4 Stunden, wobei alle Anrufer überleben
description.french: Vous avez terminé le jeu en moins de 4 heures et sauvé tout le monde.
description.italian: Finisci il gioco in meno di 4 ore facendo sopravvivere tutte le persone che telefonano
description.koreana: 전화 연결된 청취자가 모두 생존한 상태로, 4시간 안에 게임을 끝내세요
description.spanish: Termina el juego en menos de 4 horas con todos los oyentes vivos.
description.schinese: 在4小时内完成游戏，且所有来电者都成功幸存
description.tchinese: 4 小時內在所有聽眾都生還的情況下通關遊戲
description.russian: Вы прошли игру менее чем за 4 часа и никого не угробили.
description.japanese: 電話をかけてきた全員を生存させて、4時間以内にゲームをクリアする
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo em menos de 4 horas salvando todos os ouvintes
